item.description:
I'm pre-launching a new Meetup group focused on professional networking. Check it out:

Click to Join Boston Professional Networkers

 

How Startup Funding Works

This looks like a great free talk on Startup Funding that I am attending.

 

When you have a great business idea, you’ll need money to get it off and running. Funding will help you with product development, personnel, and office space—but how do you get your hands on that money? Nick Ducoff, VP of Content at Boundless, will walk you through the processes of securing funding, who to talk to, and how to best pitch your idea to investors.

After Nick's talk, we'll pick your brain on education, studying, and college life—and you can pick ours on internships/jobs, entrepreneurship, and startup tips.

Boundless Networking Nights are a great chance to meet with experienced entrepreneurs, chat with fellow students, and contribute to a student-centered product.

Who should come?

Bostonians interested in innovation, small business, or entrepreneurship.

 

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER

 

Important! Make sure you register on the page above, RSVP-ing does not reserve your spot at this event! RSVP after you register.

 

The talk is located at:

Boundless

207 South St

Boston, MA 02111

 

I think parking is available at:

750 Atlantic Avenue

Boston, MA 02111

(617) 345-0202

 

See you there!

~Matt
item.name: How Startup Funding Works
